Class InventoryItemFormController

java.lang.Object
com.qdc.lims.ui.controller.InventoryItemFormController
@Component @Scope("prototype") public class InventoryItemFormController extends Object
Form controller for creating and editing InventoryItem records.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates the form controller.

    Loads reference data such as units and suppliers.

    Registers a callback invoked after a successful save.
